definition[0]: a calm confident way of behaving, combined with an ability to control your feelings or reactions in difficult situations
example[0]: Louisa seems to have much more poise and confidence.
definition[1]: a graceful way of moving or standing, so that your body seems balanced and not awkward
definition[2]: to put or hold something in a carefully balanced position, especially above something else
example[3]: He poised the bottle over her glass. ‘More wine?’
